raw_comment:
If a neighborhood of 100 or 1,000 houses installed roof solar panels, what would the installation price for those homes be? Energy $ savings for average household?  For 5-10 regions of the  country.
Thanks.
ace_sentences: The houses can install roof solar panels.
The author asks what the installation price would be for these homes.
The author asks what the energy-dollar savings would be for an average household.
The author asks for estimates for 5 regions of the country.
The author asks for estimates for 10 regions of the country.
